class.name: RetargetProfile
class.brief_description: A resource that defines the intermediate bones for retarget.
class.description: This resource is special since it is only used in the editor. It does not have any effect on the retargeting calculation. The [RetargetBoneMap] is needed for each skeleton with a different bone name, but the keys must be the same. Therefore, to make it easier to generate the same keys in those, [RetargetProfile] lists the keys as intermediate bones. You need a [RetargetProfile] when you register a key to [RetargetBoneMap] or [RetargetBoneOption] in the editor. However, once you register the keys in them, you can discard the [RetargetProfile] if you don't need it. Also, you can register keys in them with the script always.

signal.name: redraw_needed
